CONTRACT_ID: BPM019321 - NGINX Software License Subscription, Maintenance and Support for DND
description: Software License Subscription, Maintenance and Support for the Department of National Defence
full_summary:
### NGINX Software License Subscription, Maintenance and Support Purchase for DND

**Contract Summary**

The Department of National Defence seeks a contract for the purchase of NGINX Software License Subscription, Maintenance and Support for its headquarters in Kingston, Ontario. Interested suppliers are required to submit a Request for Quotations document to the Procurement Authority for consideration.

**Contract Details**

* Date of Publication: September 14, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: September 18, 2023 at 14:00:00
* Procurement Method: Competitive bidding through Request for Quotations
* Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Evaluated Price (LEP)
* Mandatory Requirement: Annex A - List of Deliverables and Pricing

**Additional Important Information**

Due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, suppliers must submit their bids electronically using the Procurement Authority's email address. Faxed and hard copy bids will not be accepted, except in exceptional circumstances.

**Notice of Procurement**

Notice of Proposed Procurement is hereby given to all interested suppliers.  The Department of National Defence requires the services of a supplier to provide NGINX Software License Subscription, Maintenance and Support. This procurement is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and only Canadian businesses are eligible to participate.

**Bid Submission Requirements**

To be eligible for evaluation, bid submissions must include the required documents and pricing information. Interested suppliers are also expected to comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

**Contracting Entity**

The contracting entity for this procurement is Shared Services Canada, located at 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K0A 0C3.

**Procurement Contact Information**

For any inquiries or clarification regarding this procurement, please contact:

Agnes Kowalska
Shared Services Canada
(343) 551-9034
agnes.kowalska2@ssc-spc.gc.ca

**Attachments**

The Request for Quotations document is available for download from the following link: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/A40286E0-46BF-4411-AB35-CFB9968A07D3. Please note that the document is available in both English and French.

**Deadline and Closings**

The deadline for bid submission is September 18, 2023 at 14:00:00. No late bids will be accepted.

Never before have your expert technical writing skills been more valued - Bravo!

---
